pageContent: 9 THE SPHERE OF YESOD The Foundation The Astral Light The Storehouse of Images The Cycling Energies underlying Matter; the Coiled Energies of Kundalini Symbols: The Perfume and Sandals Planet: The Moon Color: Violet Of the Thirty-Two Paths of Wisdom the Ninth is known as the Pure Intelligence.The Sphere of the Operation of Yesod is that of Levanah, the L unar beam,bestowing change, increase and decrease upon created things and it rules the s phere of action of the Moon and the nature of mankind. Shaddai is a God who sheddeth benefits, Omnipotent and Satisfying, and Al Chai is the God of Life, the Living One. Its Archangel is Gabriel, the Prince of Change and Alteration.And the na me of the order of Angels is Kerubim or Kerubic Ones who are al so called the Order of Angels.
